name: Promotion Class: Arbiter
description:
Role: Ranged Control

Sacrificing damage and healing potential, this maven of battle excels at controlling enemies.

Stat Adjustments:
Support Power +300

Traits Granted:
Plate Armor Proficiency
Hammer Mastery
Buckler Mastery
Medium Shield Mastery

Enhancements:
Holy Symbol: Now applies a Knockdown to enemies.
Illuminate: Now basic attacks regenerate mana for XXX seconds.
Flash Of Light: Now also Blinds enemeis within 5m of target, up to 4 additional targets.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Arbiter promotion class and prevents access to the Crusader and Radical promotion classes.
